Package simulation

Class SimulationPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.game.player.MovablePlayer
      • simulation.SimulationPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMovablePlayer, IPlayer
    public class SimulationPlayer
extends MovablePlayer
    A movable Player which is controlled by the Simulated Game.

      • SimulationPlayer

        public SimulationPlayer​(int playerId,
                        Point2i initialPosition,
                        PlayerDirection initialDirection,
                        int initialSpeed)
        Creates a new Simulated Player starting at round 1.
        Parameters:
        playerId - the Id of the Player
        initialPosition - the Player's start position
        initialDirection - the Player's start direction
        initialSpeed - the Player's start speed (usually 1)

      • SimulationPlayer

        public SimulationPlayer​(int playerId,
                        Point2i initialPosition,
                        PlayerDirection initialDirection,
                        int initialSpeed,
                        int initialRound)
        Creates a new Simulated Player.
        Parameters:
        playerId - the Id of the Player
        initialPosition - the Player's start position
        initialDirection - the Player's start direction
        initialSpeed - the Player's start speed (usually 1)
        initialRound - the round in which the player should be initialized
